abstract: Walt Disney Company is in negotiations with Spanish-language broadcaster Univision to sell its stake in companies' joint venture Fusion.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company is said to be in talks with Univision to sell its stake in Fusion, the joint venture started by the two companies.

headline.main: Disney Eyes Fusion Exit as Venture Struggles
headline.print_headline: Disney Eyes Fusion Exit as Venture Struggles

snippet: The Walt Disney Company is said to be in talks with Univision to sell its stake in Fusion, the joint venture started by the two companies.
